author: Aaron Blake
title: Deborah Birx’s important reminder about coronavirus worst-case scenarios
description: It's popular to cite the higher-end of estimates. Birx offered some vital context to them on Wednesday.
content: Anthony S. Fauci admonished against the latter approach during congressional testimony earlier this month. When asked about one estimate the virus could hit as many as 150 million Americans, he said, I think we really need to be careful with those kinds of pr… [+2785 chars]
